name: Speed Limit: Stage 2
summary:
"Speed Limit: Stage 2" is the second level of our arcade platformer "Speed Limit" which has been redesigned for mobile devices. 
 
The full "Speed Limit" game is a retro style shooter for PCs and arcade cabinets inspired by old-school arcade games. The player runs for his life from well-dressed baddies through many taxing levels which get ever faster as you run, drive sports cars and fly fighter jets to escape your doom! The gameplay changes as you progress through the levels, to keep you on your toes, and keep you guessing what lurks around the corner. 
 
To get up to date information, be sure to follow us on Facebook and Twitter on @gamechuckdev :)
